settings.heading: Innovative Features
settings.subheading: TALA combines cutting-edge technology with thoughtful design to create the ultimate dog crate experience

settings.title: CLIMATE CONTROL
settings.text: Advanced temperature regulation system keeps your pet comfortable in any environment

settings.title: SMART TECHNOLOGY
settings.text: Monitor and control your pet's environment remotely with our intuitive mobile app

settings.title: DURABLE CONSTRUCTION
settings.text: Built with high-quality, impact-resistant materials designed to last for years

settings.title: PORTABLE DESIGN
settings.text: Lightweight and easy to transport, perfect for travel and outdoor adventures

settings.title: BATTERY POWERED
settings.text: Long-lasting rechargeable battery ensures your pet stays comfortable anywhere

settings.title: ADVENTURE READY
settings.text: Designed for outdoor enthusiasts who want to bring their pets on every journey

settings.heading: Advanced Climate Control
settings.subheading: Keep your pet comfortable in any environment with our revolutionary temperature management system
settings.description: TALA's climate control system uses advanced technology to maintain the perfect temperature for your pet, regardless of external conditions. Whether it's a hot summer day or a cold winter night, your dog will always be comfortable.

settings.text: Precise temperature regulation for year-round comfort
Automatic adjustment based on ambient conditions

settings.heading: Uncompromising Safety
settings.subheading: Your pet's safety is our top priority, with features designed to protect them in any situation
settings.description: TALA is built with safety at its core. Every aspect of the design has been carefully considered to ensure your pet is secure and protected at all times, giving you peace of mind wherever you go.

settings.text: Impact-resistant exterior protects against bumps and falls
Ventilation system ensures proper airflow at all times
Secure locking mechanism prevents accidental openings
Anti-slip base keeps the crate stable on any surface

settings.heading: Ultimate Portability
settings.subheading: Take your pet anywhere with TALA's lightweight, easy-to-transport design
settings.description: TALA's innovative design makes it incredibly easy to transport, allowing you to bring your pet on all your adventures. Whether you're traveling by car, plane, or foot, TALA goes wherever you go.

settings.text: Compact design fits in most vehicles

settings.heading: Join the TALA Revolution
settings.subheading: Be among the first to experience the world's most advanced dog crate. Sign up for our waitlist to receive exclusive updates and early access.

settings.title: Join the Waitlist
settings.text: Be the first to know when TALA becomes available. Sign up for exclusive updates and early access.
settings.success_text: You've been added to our waitlist. We'll keep you updated on TALA's progress and notify you when it's available.
